docs.lead_paragraph: The wagoner Plerre is tall and straight. His eyes are brave and clear: And they shine with a softer, deeper light When sweet Lisette is near.

headline.main: BEST LITERATURE OF THE DAY; A PICARDY PASTORAL.

docs.abstract: "Serpent of Old Nile (A)"; J. Graham in Good Words
docs.snippet: The wagoner Plerre is tall and straight. His eyes are brave and clear: And they shine with a softer, deeper light When sweet Lisette is near.
